'''Proceedings'''

'''Topics Discussed'''

* EPC Wireless Update.

Testing on the 6th went very well. gcleric, jimrz, deinerson1, doomcat, and dthomasdigital went though a series of tests and the mesh network met most of the goals.

Moving ahead with the mesh network setup for the wireless system for the EPC complex. gcleric will be purchasing the devices and the rest of the group will reimburse. 

The devices should be in after Christmas.

* Additional EPC News.

Lots of other things going on at EPC too. Training, system updates, and even security both cyber and physical. Still planning a December 20th visit to take care of these issues. 

deinerson1 taught classes on the 7th, computers 101 at the EPC computer lab, around 10 people came for the class.

* New Mexico Linux Corporation News

Named gcleric as CIO of the New Mexico Linux Corporation and announced the new IRC channel recently created for the New Mexico Linux Fest #newmexicolinuxfest on FREENODE.
